page.title: 11ST.PHILIP'S & ST.JAMES/3
page.content:
The font is at the back and it is used for christening babies. Just beside the altar is where the choir sits and each choir member has a little lamp.
Outside you can see where the new part of the church was built in 1871. The old and new styles of architecture are completely different. There is also a clock which needs repairing. It will cost Â£1,200 to repair. The fact which I thought was very interesting was that, when the church was built, at first it was worth Â£1,800, now the insurance men value it at Â£3.5 million.
